thread.title: Washington’s $500 Million Financial-Storm Forecaster Is Foundering

author: Ryan Tracy
title: Washington’s $500 Million Financial-Storm Forecaster Is Foundering
text:
Congress created a brand new agency after the 2008 financial crisis with a gargantuan mission: Serve as the finance world’s version of the National Weather Service.
The new Office of Financial Research wasn’t expected to prevent economic storms, but it was supposed to anticipate them and issue warnings to help authorities contain the damage.
Almost... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
